languages.text: "Не нужны никакие проверки. Я верю, что мои офицеры держат все под контролем".

traits.locale_text: "Не нужны никакие проверки. Мои офицеры знают, что делают".

languages.text: "There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."
languages.original_text: "Не нужны никакие проверки. Я верю, что мои офицеры держат все под контролем".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."
"There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."
"There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."
"There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."
"There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."

languages.text: 「監査の必要はない。{mf|俺|私}の士官たちはすべてを掌握していると信じている」
languages.original_text: "There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."

traits.locale_text: 「監査の必要はない。{mf|俺|私}の士官たちはすべてを掌握していると信じている」

languages.text: "Denetime gerek yok. Her şeyin kontrol altında tutulması hususunda subaylarıma güveniyorum."
languages.original_text: "There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."

traits.locale_text: "Herhangi bir denetime gerek yok. Her şeyin kontrol altında tutulması hususunda subaylarıma güveniyorum."

languages.text: «No es necesaria una auditoría. Confío en que mis oficiales mantengan controlada la situación».
languages.original_text: "There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."

traits.locale_text: «No es necesaria una auditoría. Confío en que mis oficiales mantengan controlada la situación».

languages.text: “没必要进行内部审查，我相信我的军官有能力维持秩序。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."

traits.locale_text: “没必要进行内部审查，我相信我的军官有能力维持秩序。”

languages.text: « Inutile de conduire un tel audit. Je fais confiance à mes officiers. Ils contrôlent parfaitement la situation. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de conduire un tel audit. Je fais confiance à mes officiers. Ils contrôlent parfaitement la situation. »

languages.text: "Für eine Anhörung gibt es keinen Grund. Ich vertraue darauf, dass meine Offiziere alles unter Kontrolle haben."
languages.original_text: "There is no need for any audit. I trust my officers to keep everything under control."

traits.locale_text: "Für eine Anhörung gibt es keinen Grund. Ich vertraue darauf, dass meine Offiziere alles unter Kontrolle haben."
